gui.mode

Class ModeGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.mode.ModeGUI
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HammingCodeGUI, MNISTGUI, VierBitXorGUI, XORGUI

    public abstract class ModeGUI
extends java.lang.Object
    This class builds the GUI for specific training cases.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Fabian von der Warth
